comment.author: 59174767@N04
comment._content: I think this may be the Honour Guard for King George VI and Queen Elizabeth in 1939..perhaps in Halifax? The Princess Louise Fusiliers are on the left in the guard.

comment.author: 61232251@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/59174767@N04] And check out the folks on the roof! Yes, it's somewhere in the province... they went on an extensive tour just before the outbreak of WWII.
